title: Lyft: Comprehensive guide to start competition
description: Lyft: Comprehensive guide to start competition The image from L5Kit official document: http://www.l5kit.org/README.html In this kernel, I will explain how to setup develop environment & the data for this competition. The dataset structure is a bit complicated since the Lyft Level 5 dataset contains various kinds of information. Lyft provided a useful library to deal with this data, we need to learn how to fully-utilize these provided tools at first!
